title: Billing - Bill for Project Work
description: A fixed-fee project has been completed, and the finance team needs to create the final invoice.

tasks.description: Verify that the client has signed off on the project completion document.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager confirms the project is officially closed.

tasks.description: Create a one-time invoice in the PSA for the total fixed-fee amount of the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: An invoice for the project work is generated.

tasks.description: Send the invoice to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives the final bill for the project.
